biotools.summary: An open-source Simulink library for developing closed-loop brain signal interfaces in animals and humans | Simulink Brain Signal Interface (SimBSI) | SimBSI is an open-source graphical environment for the rapid prototyping of animal and human brain-computer interfaces (BCIs). SimBSI is designed as a library on top of the graphical programming environment of Simulink with three goals in mind:
